name: Gerad Suyderhoud
title: Product | Development | Data
objective: I’m passionate about creating delightful software that improves people’s everyday lives.
summary: I am at my best when working with highly-engaged teams to solve real problems.

degrees.summary: B.S. Computer Science, Economics Minor; Postgraduate Coursework in Statistics

jobs.title: Creator
jobs.summary: I created and run a 48-hour hackathon for developers to build apps using node.js. Over 1000 participate from around the world.

jobs.title: (co)Labs Entrepreneur
jobs.summary: I was honored to be one of Sequoia’s founding “(co)Labs Entrepreneurs.”

jobs.title: Owner
jobs.summary: I have many side-projects where I dabble with new technology or product ideas. Here are some of my favorites.

jobs.title: Founder
jobs.summary: I founded and ran Fortnight Labs, a web design & development consulting company.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.summary: I joined Swivel, “YouTube for Data,” as a developer. I was quickly promoted to product manager and ended up co-leading the company.

jobs.title: Lead Analyst
jobs.summary: I analyzed customer data for Apple’s Product Marketing team.

jobs.title: Analyst
jobs.summary: I performed economic analyses in a variety of industries and practice areas.

caddyhack.name: Caddyhack
caddyhack.summary: A caddy on your wrist. A social golf tracker for the Apple watch.

golfcourseswiki.name: Golf Courses Wiki
golfcourseswiki.summary: An open golf course database. Used as a data source for Caddyhack.

tractor.name: Tractor
tractor.summary: Automatic time tracking from your menubar.

gifster.name: Gifster
gifster.summary: Create animated gif screencasts. Great for bug reports.

distractless.name: Distractless
distractless.summary: A chrome extension to eliminate internet distractions.

monitaur.name: Monitaur
monitaur.summary: Instant server monitoring. Like Google analytics for  server disk space.

lazeroids.name: Lazeroids
lazeroids.summary: Real-time massively multiplayer asteroids on the web. Before people did that. Rails Rumble “Most Innovative” award winner.

gentrifire.name: Gentrifire
gentrifire.summary: A tongue-in-cheek approach to finding your next apartment.

forwardtrail.name: ForwardTrail
forwardtrail.summary: Rebuilt Sequoia’s custom CRM system into a commercial product.

grove.name: Grove
grove.summary: Defined and built a private community site for Sequoia founders.

grove-public.name: Grove Public
grove-public.summary: Defined and built a site for public Sequoia content.

sms.name: Sequoia SMS
sms.summary: Defined and built a minimum viable CRM that grew into an essential tool for Sequoia partners.

rleague.name: Research League
rleague.summary: Defined and built a private social network for the investment community.

solarclover.name: SolarClover Dashboard
solarclover.summary: Built a mobile dashboard for home solar installations.

sentinel.name: Tyco Dashboard
sentinel.summary: Built a mobile dashboard for corporate solar installations.

spotxchange.name: SpotXChange
spotxchange.summary: Researched, designed and prototyped for an ad exchange publisher dashboard

nomic.name: Nomic
nomic.summary: Performed research, design and prototyping for an early stage retail startup.

stretch.name: Stretch the Imagination
stretch.summary: Maintained legacy Rails app for a preschool.

datamart.name: Data Mart
datamart.summary: Developed marketing data mart for ad hoc marketing queries.

prdprs.name: IT Infrastructure
prdprs.summary: Created requirements and performed acceptance testing for IT infrastructure projects.

listselection.name: Customer Analysis
listselection.summary: Analyzed customer data to target marketing campaigns.

casework.name: Case Work
casework.summary: Supported expert testimony by creating economic and statistical models using SAS, SQL and Excel.

opswork.name: Process Automation
opswork.summary: Streamlined case and data management practices by automating tasks.

hobbies.name: Fatherhood
hobbies.summary: My wife and I recently had our first child: Ella Cha Suyderhoud. It’s been more work than I expected, but extremely fulfilling.

hobbies.name: Running
hobbies.summary: I run 3-4 days a week. It helps keep me sane. To stay motivated I’ll occasionally compete in a trail race or half marathon. Right now, my next race is the Kaiser Half.

hobbies.name: Triathlon
hobbies.summary: I don’t have enough time anymore, but I used to be an avid triathlete. I’ve done: Ironman Lake Tahoe, Vineman Aquabike, Lake Tahoe Triathlon, Lake Tahoe Xterra, Big Kahuna Triathlon, Donner Lake Triathlon, Marin County Triathlon, Santa Cruz Triathlon.
